column5: This course is specifically aimed at International students, supporting those wishing to gain practical work based experiential learning. Together with studying your chosen course we are offering you the opportunity to secure a placement for an additional 6 months, making the course 18 months in length. This allows students with limited experience to put into practice the skills and techniques developed throughout the Master’s degree.Our Master's with placement course is designed to meet the demand for a new kind of IT specialist with the skills and knowledge in data science.
column7: International fees : Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
